sentence: Why do golfers wear two pairs of pants? in case they get a hole in one!
explanation: 1. An opening in a solid object. 2. A deficiency or lack of something.
first_new_sentence: The children dug a hole in the backyard.
second_new_sentence: The companys profits took a significant hole after the recession.

sentence: How many buzzfeed writers does it take to change a lightbulb? 13. number 9 will shock you!
explanation: 1. To cause someone to feel surprised or upset. 2. A sudden jolt of electrical energy.
first_new_sentence: The news of the scandal caused widespread shock across the nation.
second_new_sentence: The electrical shock was strong enough to knock him unconscious.

sentence: What does a clock do when its hungry? it goes back 4 seconds.
explanation: 1. Units of time. 2. A subsequent chance or opportunity.
first_new_sentence: The meeting will last for three minutes and four seconds.
second_new_sentence: After reviewing her first job application, she had seconds thoughts about her qualifications.

sentence: What do you call a nun in a wheelchair... virgin mobile
explanation: 1. A person who has never engaged in sexual intercourse. 2. A brand name associated with mobile networks.
first_new_sentence: She was proud to be a virgin until marriage.
second_new_sentence: The Virgin brand has expanded into various sectors, including telecommunications.

sentence: What did one hand say to the other? help, i think im in glove.
explanation: 1. A covering for the hands. 2. To be in close cooperation or agreement.
first_new_sentence: He always wore a glove while playing baseball.
second_new_sentence: The teams defense was in glove, allowing no runs to be scored.
